title: Levitt: Sanders phenomenon is a parallel of Trump phenomenon
itunes:title: Levitt: Sanders phenomenon is a parallel of Trump phenomenon
description:
Former SEC Chairman Arthur Levitt says that Americans don't want politics as usual. He joins Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
